amendment.description: Amendment added to the study an assessment of any impact a wild and scenic designation in the study area is likely to have on energy production, transmission or conveyance.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 110-834 to amend the bill by adding to the proposed study an assessment of any impact a wild and scenic designation in the study area is likely to have on energy production, transmission or conveyance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Bishop (UT).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
